S08n699:9: prajñājñānaṃ tṛtīyaṃ vai caturthaṃ tat punastathā ||
S08n699:23: atra ca pañcābhiṣekaḥ pañcasu locanādividyāyāḥ vyāpārāt |
S08n699:24: atra ca avidyāmalakṣālanāya akṣobhyarūpeṇa vajrācāryyeṇa vairocanarūpāvalambini śiṣye salilābhiṣeko deyaḥ |
S08n699:32: yatra bhavasarodbha[va]mukhāt sphuranti pañcārarūpiṇo munayaḥ pañcaskandhaviśuddhyā niṣkrāntā bhavaśarīreṇa |
S08n699:33: iha ca madhyārābhimukhata uparyadhareṇa sarvve rūpādayo vijñānātmakā iti sūcyante |
S08n699:34: ete ca sarvve sarvvātmakā iti nive[da]yituṃ sarvvatraiva caturaśrī |
S08n699:35: atha te dharmmasya buddhā hūnādaniveditātmarūpasya pañcāsivimuktakāyāḥ paryyante cānyatra visphuritā śūnyatānimittāḥ praṇihi(hi)
S08n699:42: asya ca vajrābhiṣekasy avidhānaṃ utpaśyamānā bhedyajñānabījādhānamiva vidhātuṃ evaṃ vajraghaṇṭā'
S08n699:43: pi pūrvvābhisandhānena dvādaśāṅguliparimāṇā adhomukhāmbhojavajrasamāpattiniḥ svabhāvena sarvvadharmmasvabhāvaṃ pratipādayituṃ abhedyajñānanigadatāṃ dharmmodayasya bodhayituṃ mūrddhādhobhāge ca vajrāvalīyugalamālinī |
S08n699:44: tridhātukasvabhāvakūṭāgāratāmasya sthāpayituṃ hārārdhahāraprakāra ata eva pañcatathāgatāṅkitaḥ śūnyatākaruṇābhinnajñānakāraṇatāṃ āvedayitumapari[ṇata]prajñāmukhākhyānam |
S08n699:45: asya ca dharmma dhātusvarūpasya jñānasya vairocanādipañcatathāgatātmakatāṃ ca rūpādipañcaskandhasvabhāvatāṃ ca pṛthivyādipañcadhāturūpatāṃ ca kathayituṃ ūrddhaṃ pañcāraviracanā |
S08n699:48: anuttarāśeṣadharmmabodhād vikārakaṃ iha prādhānyasyāpanāya hetukatāpratipādanāya ca kāraṇabhūtamapi vajraghaṇṭābhiṣekamullaṅghya prathamaṃ vajrābhiṣekadānam |
S08n699:49: sarvvadharmmā nāsatā iti pratipādanārthaṃ bhaviṣyanmunīndrapadocitanāmanidānāvadānārthaṃ ca pūrvva nāmavyapanayena svadevatākulagotrānusāreṇa nāmābhiṣekaḥ |
S08n699:51: itaḥ prabhṛti asaṃskṛto bhedayuganaddhabāhibo[dhi]dharmmasamayastvaṃ iti bodhayituṃ vajrasamayaḥ,
S08n699:54: maṇḍalatattvaṃ maṇḍalaviśuddhilakṣaṇaṃ devatātattvam devatāviśuddhilakṣaṇaṃ ācāryyaparikarmma ca maṇḍalasādhanajñānaṃ pañcapradīpaṃ cāmṛtabhakṣaṇaṃ ca bhavyatātattvaṃ ca naiḥsvābhāvyameṣāmutpannakramapakṣataḥ dharmmacakrapravarttanārthamanujñā |
S08n699:56: tathā hi bhuvo dharādeḥ svaḥ svarūpaṃ bhūrbhūyā iti hi bhūrbhuvaḥ svarityasyārthaḥ |
S08n699:68: prajñājñānameva prakṛtirūpaṃ vikārarūpaṃ prakṛtisamutpādātmakaṃ yuganaddhādvayavāhisuviśuddhasvabhāvaṃ caturthārthamityapare |
